page.title: 03The Marine Gardens
page.content: { {Recreation: The Marine Gardens Altogether there are four Marine Gardens.Each garden is named after the terrace:Adelaide,Crescent,Beachbank, and Marine.They were opened on March 30th 1935;before that they werefields. The gardens are open from 8a.m.until dusk and are looked after by one gardener.The Gardens are very colour- ful and beautiful with evergreen shrubs and geraniums.The gardens attract mainly elderly people & those with young children.People were inter- viewed and we discovered that they came to the gardens to enjoy the scenery, the quiet and because it is safe for toddlers to play. People like to relax and sunbathe here and there are lots of benches in sheltered places away from the wind.There is some vandalism:plants pulled up.
